snippet.title: "You Kept Me Alive" - Johnny Depp Thanks His Fans For Defending Him Against Amber Heard...
snippet.description:
"You Kept Me Alive" - Johnny Depp Thanks His Fans For Defending Him Against Amber Heard...
Johnny Depp praised his fans as “soldiers” and “warriors” for their support amid his legal battle with ex-wife Amber Heard. In footage posted to Twitter back in August, Depp was seen waving to fans from a car..Depp is seen clasping his hands together and blowing a kiss to the crowd, stating: “You’re warriors. You’re all warriors. You’re all amazing soldiers. Thank you, bless you.”This is not the first time that Depp has gone and praised his supporters like this. When he was forced to resign from his role of Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts movies he thanked those who were still on his side and noted he wouldn't stop "fighting for my innocence".

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbiT0LUIbQj6CQScvWHJeKQ?sub_confirmation=1

And there you have it, everyone! A look at the situation with Johnny Depp and how he might be celebrating in his own way because things are FINALLY starting to go his way. Do you think that he is happy with all that has been going on in terms of verdicts and rulings recently? Will he finally be able to go and get his life back? What do you think needs to happen before Amber Heard is well and truly shut down? Let us know in the comments below, be sure to subscribe and we'll see you next time on the channel!

You are not required to comment to win the giveaway distributed in the video. It is ONLY a recommendation. You must have a twitter under the same username of youtube in order to qualify to get in contact with you. For more information on giveaways refer to youtube’s contest policies:  
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/1620498?hl=e

Red Carpet Full Interview: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHTK-2W11Vh1V4uwofOfR4w
